
# Cardano Example Dapp

## **Subroutines Demo**

Script that will test and explore subroutines, similar to functions in structured programming.


## Try it online: 

-  Visit [HTML5 Dapp](https://gamechangerfinance.github.io/gamechanger.wallet/examples/Subroutines%20Demo.html)
-  Run [Standalone URL dapp connection](https://beta-wallet.gamechanger.finance/api/2/run/1-H4sIAAAAAAAAA-1UTWvcMBD9K8Ln0LUleeTdW0tvbaE07an0oNjyxuAvJG2bEPa_d0a2E69x0tJCoWDM2pLmzZs3M9p5iHzlaxMdouvTje1OvmqNY29N00VXUWFcbqveV11LgLBm_lZ79qOqa-aN80y3BTN3fd1Zw9wTxRVzVVPV2jLfsfLU5kTiWNUy5-0p9ydrCtbb7mh101Tt8RWG8_c9CRli4t4ahLVfPr3_qL03ljTcet8fdru6y3V92zl_EHEc7wqUu9N9tSt036Mj6umsf-2I7FHSmJM9Ic8Dfa7Nd2N1_blqjKOjMXzVDM7Xkwxtj-7N_TtzT6CYXo07IvCDcU4fDetKFkfnqyhZNSVk4qsmHp3RVtquiQ5fo_hO3XCuJOzxl0PKudCcp0KlwBWHUqVkA0MWnnMOElIlQKBtr-JgK8G84EWYDBIlcaXwLIccVzGhQCJeEAYSHkudCllKQ1bEE7KEBCRZkenSn6MK9MYv4kk7oZTAd4aWjPyAuPdQ4DoftKMHap5ynGcx5pbgXiHLYL8BRVF4xtWjRfG9Kka2uQb0oDpitJIiDwyoFTURO_oED8z3CUsaZWARQ8yhE3ONgwIpKAohweBu4TdyU66KKo6VWuWaEFJSNyBJVeh5tuQbKrHUtqiHQISgWnOzwM4qBGMkGXoysVBFFE8llON5tlJnAwXqpaT3A9-QZeimCDfsmYr9g64-apg8pq4S--JuZivZlsBBhxONaunfkz1T2Xm2oRLhiZ_qsbhR--d6_7Jm1JoG32xe61_fqJdZ13O6YFWXvQ0d_7tIK_dnFoHmEOr4oxqR_kSkIsGL9Js3dnpwmm9jdhuz25jdxuw2Zrcxu43ZbcxuY3Ybs__rmP12Pp9_AuX9zDfBEQAA)

## Source code:

- dapp connection code: [GCScript](Subroutines%20Demo.gcscript)
- frontend + dapp connection code : [HTML5 dapp](Subroutines%20Demo.html)

Dapp code was autogenerated by [Playground IDE in GameChanger Wallet ](https://beta-wallet.gamechanger.finance/playground)

## GCScript code (dapp connection):
```json
{
  "title": "Subroutines Demo",
  "description": "Script that will test and explore subroutines, similar to functions in structured programming.",
  "type": "script",
  "returnURLPattern": "http://localhost:3000/demo/api/dapp",
  "exportAs": "subroutineDemo",
  "run": {
    "runSeveralTimes": {
      "type": "importAsScript",
      "argsByKey": {
        "0": {
          "msg": "Message of 0"
        },
        "1": {
          "msg": "Message of 1"
        },
        "2": {
          "msg": "Message of 2"
        }
      },
      "from": [
        "",
        "",
        ""
      ]
    }
  }
}
```

## Run standalone QR dapp connection: 

You can use [Playground IDE in GameChanger Wallet ](https://beta-wallet.gamechanger.finance/playground) in `QR URL Transport` mode to capture results

[![This GCScript/URL is too large! make it shorter uploading parts to GCFS. Unable to generate QR code](Subroutines%20Demo.png)](https://gamechangerfinance.github.io/gamechanger.wallet/examples/Subroutines%20Demo.png)
